00026 /* LowLevelPacket Class Impl */
00027 LowLevelPacket::LowLevelPacket()
00028 {
00029     source = -1;
00030     destination = -1;
00031     transaction_id = -1;
00032     virtual_channel = 0;
00033     sent_time = 0;
00034     length = 0;
00035 
00036 }
00037 
00038 LowLevelPacket::~LowLevelPacket()
00039 {
00040     flits.clear();
00041     control_bits.clear();
00042     payload.clear();
00043 }               /* -----  end of function LowLevelPacket::~LowLevelPacket()  ----- */
00044 
00045 void LowLevelPacket::operator=( const LowLevelPacket* p )
00046 {
00047     source = p->source;
00048     destination = p->destination;
00049     transaction_id = p->transaction_id;
00050     pkt_cnt = p->pkt_cnt;
00051     virtual_channel = p->virtual_channel;
00052     sent_time = p->sent_time;
00053     msg_class = p->msg_class;
00054     length = p->length;
00055     for ( uint i=0; i<control_bits.size(); i++)
00056         this->control_bits.push_back(p->control_bits[i]); 
00057 
00058     for ( uint i=0; i<payload.size(); i++)
00059         this->payload.push_back(p->payload[i]); 
00060 }

00062 string
00063 LowLevelPacket::toString () const
00064 {
00065     stringstream str;
00066     str << "LowLevelPacket: " << endl;
00067     str << "\t Source: " << source 
00068         << "\t Destination: " << destination
00069         << "\t virtual_channel: " << virtual_channel 
00070         << "\t sent time: " << sent_time
00071         << "\t No of flits: " << flits.size()
00072         << "\t length: " << length
00073         << "\t msg_class: " << msg_class
00074         << "\t addr: " << hex << addr << dec
00075         << "\t hop_count: " << hop_count
00076         << "\t network_latency: " << avg_network_latency
00077                 << "\t PacketCount: " << dec << pkt_cnt
00078         << endl;
00079 /* 
00080     for ( uint i=0 ; i<flits.size() ; i++ )
00081         if( flits[i]->type == HEAD)
00082             str << static_cast<HeadFlit*>(flits[i])->toString();
00083         else if( flits[i]->type == BODY)
00084             str << static_cast<BodyFlit*>(flits[i])->toString();

00089  * */
00090     return str.str();

00093 bool
00094 LowLevelPacket::valid_packet ()
00095 {
00096     if( flits.size())
00097         return (flits.size() == static_cast<HeadFlit*>(flits[0])->length);
00098     else
00099         return false;
00100 
00101 }               /* -----  end of function LowLevelPacket::valid_packet  ----- */
00102 
00103 void
00104 LowLevelPacket::add ( Flit* ptr )
00105 {
00106     switch (ptr->type)
00107     {
00108         case HEAD:
00109             {
00110                 HeadFlit* hf = static_cast < HeadFlit*> (ptr);
00111 //                flits.push_back(hf);
00112                 this->source = hf->src_address;
00113                 this->destination = hf->dst_address;
00114                 this->transaction_id = hf->transaction_id;
00115                 this->virtual_channel = hf->vc;
00116                 this->length = hf->length;
00117                 this->msg_class = hf->msg_class;
00118                 this->sent_time = hf->packet_originated_time;
00119                 this->addr = hf->addr;
00120                 this->avg_network_latency = hf->avg_network_latency;
00121                 this->hop_count = hf->hop_count;
00122                 this->stat_memory_serviced_time = hf->stat_memory_serviced_time;
00123                 this->req_start_time = hf->req_start_time;
00124                 this->waiting_in_ni = hf->waiting_in_ni;
00125                 this->pkt_cnt = hf->pkt_cnt;
00126 
00127     for ( uint i=0; i<hf->control_bits.size(); i++)
00128         this->control_bits.push_back(hf->control_bits[i]); 
00129 
00130     for ( uint i=0; i<hf->payload.size(); i++)
00131         this->payload.push_back(hf->payload[i]); 
00132 
00133                 delete hf;
00134                 break;
00135             }
00136         case BODY:
00137             {
00138                 BodyFlit* bf = static_cast<BodyFlit*> (ptr);
00139     for ( uint i=0; i<bf->bf_data.size(); i++)
00140         this->payload.push_back(bf->bf_data[i]); 
00141 //                flits.push_back(bf);
00142                 delete bf;
00143                 break;
00144             }
00145         case TAIL:
00146             {
00147                 TailFlit* tf = static_cast<TailFlit*> (ptr);
00148 //                flits.push_back(tf);
00149                 this->sent_time = tf->packet_originated_time;
00150                 this->avg_network_latency = tf->avg_network_latency - this->avg_network_latency;
00151                 delete tf;
00152                 break;
00153             }
00154         default:
00155             fprintf(stdout,"ERROR Unk flit type");
00156             break;
00157     }
00158     return ;
00159 }               /* -----  end of function LowLevelPacket::add  ----- */

00161 Flit* LowLevelPacket::at(unsigned int index)
00162 {
00163     if(index > flits.size())
00164         fprintf(stdout," Error Index out of bounds in lowlevelpacket");
00165 
00166     return flits.at(index);
00167 }
00168 
00169 Flit* LowLevelPacket::get_next_flit()
00170 {
00171     Flit *ptr;
00172     ptr = flits.front();
00173     flits.pop_front();
00174     return ptr;
00175 }

00181     return;
00182 }               /* -----  end of function LowLevelPacket::clear  ----- */
